Constructor Detail

Server

public Server(int port)
Instantiate a server on the specified port.

Parameters:
port - The port to use for our server
Method Detail

listen

public void listen()
Listen for connections on the port specified in the Server constructor. Create new ServerConnections and corresponding Users when a connection is made.

makeUserFromSocket

public void makeUserFromSocket(java.net.Socket socket)
Creates an instance of User with unique to represent the client on the socket and adds it to the Server's userMap. The User is given a default name.

Parameters:
socket, - the Socket the user is communicating from

createChannel

public Channel createChannel(java.lang.String channelName,
                             int firstUserId)
Create a Channel as per request from a User, with a given channel Name.

Parameters:
channelName - - the name the User wants to call this new Channel. channelName cannot be identical to the name of a Channel already on the server. This is maintained by the GUI/Client side.
firstUserId - - the User requesting to creating this channel. Must be a key in this.userMap.
Returns:
the newly created Channel.

addUserToChannel

public void addUserToChannel(int userId,
                             java.lang.String channelName)
Have a User join a Channel with a specified name, if such a Channel exists.

Parameters:
userId - - the userID of the User making the join request. Must be a key in this.userMap.
channelName - - the name of the Channel the User wants to join.

removeUserFromChannel

public void removeUserFromChannel(int userID,
                                  java.lang.String channelName)
Removes a User from a Channel with a specified name, if such a Channel exists.

Parameters:
int - userID - the ID of the User that will be removed. Must be a key in this.userMap.
channelName - - the name of the Channel the User will be removed from.

getUserList

public java.lang.String getUserList()
Returns a string representation of all active Users on the Server.

Returns:
a string of active User nicknames separated by " ".

getChannelList

public java.lang.String getChannelList()
Returns a string representation of all active Channels on the Server.

Returns:
a string of active Channel names separated by " ".

getChannelUsers

public java.lang.String getChannelUsers(java.lang.String channelName)
Returns a string representation of all Users that are members of a Channel.

Returns:
a string of User nicknames separated by " ".

getChannelMessages

public java.lang.String getChannelMessages(java.lang.String channelName)
Supporting method; may not be used. Returns a string representation of all messages on a Channel.

Returns:
a string of Channel messages separated by "\n".

sendMessageToChannel

public void sendMessageToChannel(int userID,
                                 Packet message)
Sends a Message to a requested Channel from a User, if the Channel exists.

Parameters:
userID - - the int ID of the User sending the message. Must be a key in this.userMap.
message - - a Packet containing info as to which Channel the message is being sent to and the contents of the message.

notifyServerOfUserDisconnect

public void notifyServerOfUserDisconnect(int userId)
Removes a User from the Server upon its client disconnecting and erases its presence from the Server's Channels.

Parameters:
userId - - the ID of the User leaving the Server.

getChannel

public Channel getChannel(java.lang.String channelName)
Gets an instance of Channel.

Parameters:
channelName -
Returns:
requested instance of Channel; returns null if requested Channel does not exist.

getUser

public User getUser(int userID)
Used in Server testing. Gets an instance of User.

Parameters:
id - - the int id of the User on the userMap.
Returns:
the User instance with the given id

addDummyUsers

public void addDummyUsers(java.lang.String s)
Used in Server testing. Create an instance of User with nickname s.

Parameters:
s, - the nickname of User.

hasChannel

public boolean hasChannel(java.lang.String name)
Used in Server testing. Checks if there is a Channel with the given name on the server.

Parameters:
name, - the name of the Channel queried about.
Returns:
true of such a named Channel exists on the server, false otherwise.

hasUser

public boolean hasUser(java.lang.String name)
Used in Server testing. Checks if there is a User with the given name on the server.

Parameters:
name, - the name of the User queried about.
Returns:
true of such a named User exists on the server, false otherwise.

               throws java.io.IOException
Closes the server.

Throws:
java.io.IOException
